p.em: Note: This Developer's Guide, like the rest of the documentation, is a work in progress. Please be patient as we continue to polish it up and add content.

div.h4: Welcome to the Symphony Developer Community
div.p: Before you get started, you'll want to make sure you've reviewed Symphony's development philosophy, and are familiar with conventions and best practices.

dl.dd: The Tao of Symphony · Best Practices for Developers (forthcoming) · Localisation in Symphony

div.p: More often than not, your work as a developer will go into creating and maintaining extensions. These resources should get you started.

dl.dd: Delegates · Extension API (forthcoming) · Extension Drivers (forthcoming) · Extension File Structure

div.p: Whether you're building an extension or simply beefing up your own Symphony project, these resources will help you craft exactly what you need.

dl.dd: Data Sources API (forthcoming) · Events API (forthcoming) · Fields API (forthcoming)

div.p: Resources on contributing to the core codebase and working with and extending core classes (forthcoming).

summary.p: The path to Symphony mastery begins here.
